DOC.brief_title: Mental Health E-screening Pregnant Postpartum Women
DOC.detailed_description: Given critical conduct screen within system link referral treatment , IMPACT pilot trial evaluating integrate screen care ( see Summary Progress ) versus usual prenatal care . The propose trial engage 2 unique clinic experience staff conduct routine screening ( referral treatment place ) evaluate different modality screen . Since widespread screen unlikely successfully implement entails additional human resource , trial ass potential sustainable , e-health alternative .
